mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL (TITLE, OID, CID, CDT) VALUES (#{title}, #{oid}, #{cid}, now())
INSERT INTO LOCATION (TRAVEL_ID, LOCATION_ID, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES (#{travelId}, #{locationId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
INSERT INTO LOCATION_DETAIL (TRAVEL_ID, LOCATION_ID, LOCATION_SQ, CONTENT) VALUES (#{travelId}, #{locationId}, #{locationSq}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT TRAVEL_ID, TITLE,/* OID, CID, */A.CDT, B.USER_ID FROM TRAVEL A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.CID = B.ID WHERE A.CID = #{id} ORDER BY CDT DESC

SELECT /* A.TRAVEL_ID, A.TITLE, A.OID, A.CID, A.CDT, */ B.TRAVEL_ID, B.LOCATION_ID, B.LATITUDE, B.LONGITUDE, C.LOCATION_SQ, C.CONTENT FROM TRAVEL A LEFT JOIN LOCATION B ON A.TRAVEL_ID = B.TRAVEL_ID LEFT JOIN LOCATION_DETAIL C ON B.TRAVEL_ID = C.TRAVEL_ID AND B.LOCATION_ID = C.LOCATION_ID WHERE A.TRAVEL_ID = #{travelId}

SELECT A.TRAVEL_ID, A.TITLE, B.LOCATION_ID, C.LOCATION_SQ, C.CONTENT FROM TRAVEL A JOIN LOCATION B ON A.TRAVEL_ID = B.TRAVEL_ID JOIN LOCATION_DETAIL C ON B.TRAVEL_ID = C.TRAVEL_ID AND B.LOCATION_ID = C.LOCATION_ID WHERE A.TRAVEL_ID = #{travelId}
